chatParticipants.name: Huckleberry
chatParticipants.description: An assistant that helps manage tasks and project requirements

commands.name: manageTasks
commands.description: Show the task management interface

languageModelTools.name: create_task
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Creates a new task in the Huckleberry Task Manager. Use this tool to create a new task with optional priority and due date information.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Creates a task in your project's task management system

languageModelTools.name: initialize_tracking
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Initialize task tracking for a project workspace. Use this tool when a user first mentions they want to track tasks or organize their project work. This tool will create the necessary file structure for task tracking in the current workspace, including a tasks.json file to store task metadata. It requires an open workspace with write access and shouldn't be used in read-only environments or when task tracking is already set up.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Sets up the task tracking system in your project

languageModelTools.name: initialise_tracking
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Initialise task tracking for a project workspace. Use this tool when a user first mentions they want to track tasks or organize their project work. This tool will create the necessary file structure for task tracking in the current workspace, including a tasks.json file to store task metadata. It requires an open workspace with write access and shouldn't be used in read-only environments or when task tracking is already set up.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Sets up the task tracking system in your project

languageModelTools.name: scan_todos
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Scans the codebase for TODO comments and converts them to tasks. Use this tool to scan the codebase for TODO comments and create tasks from them.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Finds TODOs in your code and adds them to your task list

pattern.description: Optional file pattern to scan (e.g., '**/*.ts'). If not provided, will scan all files.

languageModelTools.name: list_tasks
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Lists tasks from the task manager. Use this tool to retrieve and list tasks, optionally filtered by priority or status.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Shows your current tasks with optional filtering

languageModelTools.name: mark_task_done
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Marks a task as complete. Use this tool to mark a task as complete by providing the task ID.

taskId.description: ID of the task to mark as done

languageModelTools.name: update_task_priority
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Changes the priority of a task. Use this tool to change the priority of a task by providing the task ID and new priority.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Updates the priority of a task

taskId.description: ID of the task to update

languageModelTools.name: prioritize_tasks
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Sorts and organizes tasks by status and priority. Use this tool to sort tasks in the tasks.json file with incomplete tasks first, then by priority (critical, high, medium, low).
languageModelTools.userDescription: Sorts tasks by status and priority

languageModelTools.name: next_task
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Suggests the next task to work on based on priority and status. Use this tool to help users decide which task they should focus on next from their task list.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Suggests the next task you should work on

languageModelTools.name: help
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Provides help and explanations about Huckleberry's task management features. Use this tool when the user asks for help, instructions, or information about available commands and features.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Shows help and available commands for task management

topic.description: Optional specific feature or topic to get help about

languageModelTools.name: break_task_into_subtasks
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Breaks a task into multiple subtasks. Use this tool when a task is complex and should be divided into smaller, more manageable pieces.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Divides a complex task into multiple subtasks

taskId.description: ID of the task to break down into subtasks

huckleberry.taskmanager.defaultTasksLoca.description: Default location for task files (relative to workspace root)

huckleberry.taskmanager.taskFileTemplate.description: Template format to use when creating new task files

huckleberry.taskmanager.defaultTaskPrior.description: Default priority for new tasks when unspecified

huckleberry.taskmanager.defaultDueDate.description: Default due date setting for new tasks

huckleberry.taskmanager.customDueDateDay.description: Number of days for custom due date setting (when defaultDueDate is set to 'custom')
